data.title: N.B.C. GIVES ROLE TO MARISA PAVAN; Italian Actress Will Star in 'Antigone' Sept. 11 on TV's 'Aluminum Hour' Connie Desmond Resigns
data.meta_description: C Desmond resigns as TV announcer

N.B.C. GIVES ROLE TO MARISA PAVAN; Italian Actress Will Star in 'Antigone' Sept. 11 on TV's 'Aluminum Hour' Connie Desmond Resigns

Aug. 10, 1956

August 10, 1956 , Page 37Buy Reprints

Full text is unavailable for this digitized archive article. Subscribers may view the full text of this article in its original form through TimesMachine.

Marisa Pavan, Italian film actress who has played supporting roles in several Hollywood pictures, has been signed to star in a television adaptation of "Antigone," the Greek tragedy by Sophocles. View Full Article in Timesmachine Â»
